current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act
		  to exclude customary prompt pay discounts from manufacturers to wholesalers
		  from the average sales price for drugs and biologicals under
		  Medicare.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill; which was
			 read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Excluding customary prompt
			 pay discounts from manufacturers to wholesalers from the average sales price
			 for Medicare payments for drugs and biologicals

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1847A(c)(3) of the Social Security Act

quote.#text:
(other than customary prompt pay discounts
			 extended to wholesalers)

text.#text:
in the first
			 sentence, by inserting

quote.#text:
(other than customary prompt pay discounts
			 extended to wholesalers)

text.#text:
in the second
			 sentence, by inserting

The amendments made by this section shall apply to drugs and
			 biologicals that are furnished on or after January 1, 2014.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S806 IS: To amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exclude customary prompt pay discounts from manufacturers to wholesalers from the average sales price for drugs and biologicals under Medicare.
